text: Dang yi buneng zhengshi tamen suoyou jingdian de jingdian, cong an la nali jianglin tamen de shihou,(tamen buxin ta). Yiqian tamen changchang qidao, xiwang jie ta lai kefu buxindao zhe, ran'er, dang tamen yeyi renshi de zhenli jianglin tamen de shihou, tamen buxin ta. Gu an la de qi jue jia yu buxin zhi ren de
